name: Notion Lead's Manager
description: Do you struggle with managing your leads and clients? Do you wish you had a system in place that would help you streamline your workflow and make timely decisions? If so, I have great news for you!I have created a simple and efficient leads management template on Notion that can help you do just that. It's simple and crafted in a way that you can learn how to use it in a matter of minutes.What you will get.The template features a pipeline view that displays three sections: NEW LEADS, OPEN DISCUS
